item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Common
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Common Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Common data type contains common information for requests to the getPortalLogin API. This is an abstract class that serves as a base that more specialized classes will derive from. For example, a request class specific to SoftLayer Native IMS Login (username and password). Local securityQuestionAnswer The answer to your security question. Type: string securityQuestionId A security question you wish to answer when authenticating to the SoftLayer customer portal.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native data type contains information for requests to the getPortalLogin API. This class is specific to the SoftLayer Native login (username/password). The request information will be verified to ensure it is valid, and then there will be an attempt to obtain a portal login token in authenticating the user with the provided information. Local password Your SoftLayer customer portal user's portal password.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native_External

This class serves as a base class for more specialized external authentication classes to the SoftLayer Native login (username/password). Local password Your SoftLayer customer portal user's portal password. Type: string securityQuestionAnswer The answer to your security question. Type: string securityQuestionId A security question you wish to answer when authenticating to the SoftLayer customer portal.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration Datatype Description The hardware configuration container is used to provide configuration options for servers. Each configuration option will include both an itemPrice and a template. The itemPrice value will provide hourly and monthly costs (if either are applicable), and a description of the option. The template will provide a fragment of the request with the properties and values that must be sent when creating a server with the option.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration_Option
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration_Option Datatype Description An option found within a [[SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration (type)]] structure. Local itemPrice Provides hourly and monthly costs (if either are applicable), and a description of the option. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price preset Provides a description of a fixed configuration preset with monthly and hourly costs. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset template Provides a fragment of the request with the properties and values that must be sent when creating a server with the option.

item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Directory Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Directory represents a token authentication directory on your CDN FTP or on your origin server. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getAuthenticationDirectories Local createDate The date that a token authentication directory was created. Type: dateTime name The name of a directory or a file within a directory listing. Type: string type The type of platform that a token authentication directory is defined for.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Parameter
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Parameter Datatype Description This container is used for CDN content authentication service. External Links CDN Services at softlayer.com associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::authenticateResourceRequest seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account Local cdnAccountName A CDN account name Type: string clientIp A client IP address Type: string referrer A client referrer information Type: string sourceUrl A source URL Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_ServiceEndpoint
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_ServiceEndpoint Datatype Description CDN supports the content authentication service. With the content authentication service, customers can control access to their contents. There are several scenarios where this authentication capability could be useful. Websites can prevent other rogue websites from linking to their videos. Content owners can prevent users from passing around http links, thus forcing them to login to view contents. It is also possible to authenticate via the client IP address.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_PointsOfPresence_Summary
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_PointsOfPresence_Summary Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_PointsOfPresence_Summary models an individual CDN point of presence’s bandwidth usage for a CDN account within a given date range. CDN POPs are located throughout the world, so individual POP usage may be beneficial in determining who is downloading your CDN hosted content. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getPopNames Local bandwidth The amount of bandwidth used by a CDN POP. Type: unsigned long

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_Summary
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_Summary Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_Summary models a CDN account’s overall bandwidth usage and overages within a given date range. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getBandwidthOverage Local cdnAccountId The CDN account id Type: integer endDateTime The ending date of a CDN bandwidth summary. Type: dateTime fileName The name of a file that is requested by visitors Type: string

item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_Summary_Detail Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_Summary_File models a CDN account’s overall bandwidth usage and overages within a given date range. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getDetailedBandwidth Local cdnAccountId The CDN account id Type: integer duration The duration of a file that is viewed. Type: float endDateTime The ending date of a CDN bandwidth summary. Type: dateTime fileName The file name.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_OriginPull_Mapping
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_OriginPull_Mapping Datatype Description SoftLayer’s CDN allows for multiple origin pull domains and CNAME records. This container holds the origin pull configuration details. CDN currently supports origin pull method for HTTP content. External Links CDN Services at softlayer.com associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getOriginPullMappingInformation seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account Local cname The CNAME record. Type: string id The unique identifier of an origin pull configuration Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PointsOfPresence
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PointsOfPresence Datatype Description SoftLayer’s CDN content delivery network offering replicates your data to a number of Points of Presence (POP’s) around the world. SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PointsOfPresence models one of these POP locations. External Links CDN Services at softlayer.com associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getBandwidthOverage SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getPopNames seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account Local id A CDN Point of Presence's internal identifier. Type: integer name A CDN Point of Presence's name.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PurgeService_Response
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PurgeService_Response Datatype Description This container holds information on a purge request. [[SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::purgeCache|Purge method]] for more details. Status code can be “SUCCESS”, “FAILED”, or “INVALID_URL” “INVALID_URL” code is returned when a URL is malformed or does not belong to customer. “FAILED” is returned in case there was an internal error. External Links CDN Services at softlayer.com associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::purgeCache Local statusCode A status code indicates whether your request was successful or not Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Report_Usage
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Report_Usage Datatype Description Local applicationDeliveryNetwork Type: float applicationDeliveryNetworkSsl Type: float diskSpace Type: float endDate Type: dateTime flash Type: float http Type: float httpSmall Type: float https Type: float httpsSmall Type: float

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_SupportedProtocol
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_SupportedProtocol Datatype Description SoftLayer’s CDN content delivery network allows for multiple types of media hosting in addition to traditional HTTP hosting. Each of these media types are accessible form a different URL. SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_SupportedProtocol holds details about CDN supported media types and their associated URLs. CDN media URLs follow the standard ://..cdn.softlayer.net Flash streaming, Windows Media streaming and HTTP protocols are supported: Flash streaming: rtmp://.flash.cdn.softlayer.net Windows Media streaming: mms://.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Directory_Listing
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Directory_Listing Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Network_Directory_Listing represents a single entry in a listing of files within a remote directory. API methods that return remote directory listings typically return arrays of SoftLayer_Container_Network_Directory_Listing objects. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getDirectoryListing Local fileCount If the file in a directory listing is a directory itself then fileCount is the number of files within the directory. Type: integer name The name of a directory or a file within a directory listing.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Event
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Event Datatype Description The IntrusionProtection_Event object stores information about individual intrusion protection events. It is a data container that cannot be edited, deleted, or saved. It is returned by many methods in the TippingPointReporting object, but never directly, always as a child of another container object. Local CVEId The CVE ID(s), if any, associated with this attack signature. Type: string actionTaken The action that was taken when this attack was discovered.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistic
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistic Datatype Description The IntrusionProtection_Statistic is used exclusively by the getMainStatistics method on the TippingPointReporting service, and serves mainly as a pair object, storing a name and an attack count. Name is usually the name of an attack, but it can also be an attacking IP Address Local attackCount The number of attacks effecting this name over the time period Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistics
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistics Datatype Description The IntrusionProtection_Statistics Type is used as a container for SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistic objects. The SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistics class holds the “header” information, like the item being queried (either account or data center), the time frame, and the grand total of the attacks. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_TippingPointReporting::getMainStatistics Local target The actual target, either a datacenter name, an account ID, or a subnet IP Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_SubnetReport
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_SubnetReport Datatype Description The IntrusionProtection_SubnetReport object is the container that holds the SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Event objects for a particular subnet, or “All Subnets”, whatever the case may be. Subnet, subnet mask, direction, and the individual events are returned by this object. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_TippingPointReporting::getSubnetReportForEntireAccount SoftLayer_Network_TippingPointReporting::getReportForIpAddressOrSubnet SoftLayer_Network_TippingPointReporting::drillDownAttack Local cidr cidr for this report. If the subnetIpAddress is "All Subnets", this is set to 32 and should be ignored.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_LoadBalancer_StatusEntry
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_LoadBalancer_StatusEntry Datatype Description The LoadBalancer_StatusEntry object stores information about the current status of a particular load balancer service. It is a data container that cannot be edited, deleted, or saved. It is returned exclusively by the getStatus method on the [[SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Service]] service Local content The value of the entry. Type: string label Text description of the status entry Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Subnet_IpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Subnet_IpAddress Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Subnet_IPAddress models an IP v4 address as it exists as a member of it’s subnet, letting the user know if it is a network identifier, gateway, broadcast, or useable address. Addresses that are neither the network identifier nor the gateway nor the broadcast addresses are usable by SoftLayer servers. External Links Ip address at Wikipedia RFC791:Internet Protocol Specification at ietf.org associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Subnet::getRoutableEndpointIpAddresses seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Subnet

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Storage_Modification
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Storage_Modification Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Storage_Modification datatype has everything required to place a modification to an existing StorageLayer account with SoftLayer. Modifications, at present time, include upgrade and downgrades only. The “volumeId” property must be set to the network storage volume id to be upgraded. Once populated send this container to the [[SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder]] method. The “packageId” property passed in for CloudLayer storage accounts must be set to 0 (zero) and the “quantity” property must be set to 1.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Receipt
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Receipt Datatype Description When an order is placed (SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder), a receipt is returned when the order is created successfully. The information in the receipt helps explain information about the order. It’s order ID, and all the data within the order as well. For PayPal Orders, an URL is also returned to the user so that the user can complete the transaction. Users paying with PayPal must continue on to this URL, login and pay.

If the contact is not provided the technical contact will be used. If the address is not provided the organization information address will be used.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorSpeed
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorSpeed Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorSpeed contains graphs to display speed for each of the server’s fans. Fan speeds are gathered from the server’s remote management card. Local graph The graph to display the server's fan speed. Type: binary data title A title that may be used to display for the graph. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorTemperature
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorTemperature Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorTemperature contains graphs to display the cpu(s) and system temperatures retrieved from the management card using thermometer graphs. Local graph The graph to display the server's cpu(s) and system temperatures. Type: binary data title A title that may be used to display for the graph. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_PmInfo
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_PmInfo Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_PmInfo contains pminfo information retrieved from a server’s remote management card. Local pmInfoId PmInfo ID Type: string pmInfoReading PmInfo Reading Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReading
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReading Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReadings contains sensor information retrieved from a server’s remote management card. Local lowerCritical Lower Non-Recoverable threshold Type: string lowerNonCritical Lower Non-Critical threshold Type: string lowerNonRecoverable Lower Non-Recoverable threshold Type: string sensorId Sensor ID Type: string sensorReading Sensor Reading Type: string sensorUnits Sensor Units Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReadingsWithGraphs
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReadingsWithGraphs Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReadingsWithGraphs contains the raw data retrieved from a server’s remote management card. Along with the raw data, two sets of graphs will be returned. One set of graphs is used to display, using thermometer graphs, the temperatures (cpu(s) and system) retrieved from the management card. The other set is used to display speed for each of the server’s fans. Local rawData The raw data returned from the server's remote management card.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Resource_Metadata_ServiceResource
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Resource_Metadata_ServiceResource Datatype Description The metadata service resource container is used to store information about a single service resource. Local backendIpAddress The backend IP address for this resource Type: string type The type for this resource Type: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Resource_Type

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType Datatype Description This data type is a container that stores information about a single indexed object type. Object type information can be used for discovery of searchable data and for creation or validation of object index search strings. Each of these containers holds a collection of [[SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType_Property (type)|SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType_Property]] objects, specifying which object properties are exposed for the current user. Refer to the the documentation for the [[SoftLayer_Search/search|search()]] method for information on using object types in search strings.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType_Property
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType_Property Datatype Description This data type is a container that stores information about a single property of a searchable object type. Each [[SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType (type)|SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType]] object holds a collection of these properties. Property information can be used for discovery of searchable data and for the creation or validation of object index search strings. Note that properties are only understood by the [[SoftLayer_Search/advancedSearch|advancedSearch()]] method. Refer to the advancedSearch() method for information on using properties in search strings.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Search_Result
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Search_Result Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Search_Result data type represents a result row from an execution of Search service. Local matchedTerms An array of terms that were matched in the resource object. Type: array of strings relevanceScore The score ratio of the result for relevance to the search criteria. Type: decimal resource A search results resource object that matched search criteria.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Software_Component_HostIps_Policy
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Software_Component_HostIps_Policy Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Software_Component_HostIps_Policy container holds the title and value of a current host ips policy. item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Cache
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Cache Datatype Description These are the results of a tax calculation. The tax calculation was kicked off but allowed to run in the background. This type stores the results so that an interface can be updated with up-to-date information. Local effectiveTaxRate The percentage of the final total that should be tax. Type: decimal items The container that holds the four actual tax rates, one for each fee type.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Cache_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Cache_Item Datatype Description This represents one order item in a tax calculation. Local categoryCode The category code for the referenced product. Type: string containerHash This hash will match to the hash on an order container. Type: string itemPriceId The reference to the price for this order item. Type: integer taxRates This is the container containing the individual tax rates.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Rates
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Rates Datatype Description This contains the four tax rates, one for each fee type. Local laborTaxRate The tax rate associated with the labor fee. Type: decimal locationId A reference to a location. Type: decimal oneTimeTaxRate The tax rate associated with the one-time fee. Type: decimal recurringTaxRate The tax rate associated with the recurring fee.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone_Mode
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone_Mode Datatype Description This container can be used to configure the phone authentication mode. By default, “VOICE_CALL” in “STANDARD” mode with no Pin number will be used. With the default mode, you will have to answer a phone call from a trusted 2 form factor vendor during authentication process. You have to answer the call and follow the instruction in order to complete the authentication. You can also use SMS text message or PhoneFactor mobile app modes (in case you’re using PhoneFactor).

Local countryCode Country code number for the phone number Default: 1 (United States & Canada +1) Type: integer extension Phone extension code. It can be digits, commas, *, and # are allowed. item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Attachment
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Attachment Datatype Description At times,such as when attaching files to tickets, it is necessary to send files to SoftLayer API methods. The SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Attachment data type models a single file to upload to the API. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Ticket::addAttachedFile Local data The contents of a file that is uploaded to the SoftLayer API. Type: binary data filename The name of a file that is uploaded to the SoftLayer API.

Type: string friendlyName The friendly name of a file as it exists on the file server. Type: string modifyDate The date the file was last modified on the file server.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Entity
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Entity Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Entity data type models a single entity on a storage resource. Entities can include anything within a storage volume including files, folders, directories, and CloudLayer storage projects. External Links Internet media type at Wikipedia associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Storage::uploadFile SoftLayer_Network_Storage::downloadFile SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getAllFiles SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getFileByIdentifier SoftLayer_Network_Storage::restoreFile SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getFilesPendingDelete SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getRecycleBinFileByIdentifier Local content A file entity's raw content. Type: binary data contentType A file entity's MIME content type.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_Status Datatype Description SoftLayer customer servers that are purchased with the Microsoft Windows operating system are configured by default to retrieve updates from SoftLayer’s local Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) server. Periodically, these servers synchronize and check for new updates from their local WSUS server. SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_Status models the results of a server’s last synchronization attempt as queried from SoftLayer’s WSUS servers. External Links Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) Home associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getWindowsUpdateStatus seeAlso SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem Local lastRebootDate The last time a server rebooted due to a Windows Update.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem models a single Microsoft Update as reported by SoftLayer’s private Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) services. All servers purchased with Microsoft Windows retrieve updates from SoftLayer’s WSUS servers by default. External Links Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) Home Microsoft Help and Support associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getWindowsUpdateAvailableUpdates SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getWindowsUpdateInstalledUpdates seeAlso SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_Status Local description A short description of a Microsoft Windows Update.

Local actions The valid actions for use with rules. Type: array of strings maximumRuleCount Maximum allowed number of rules. Type: integer protocols The valid protocols for use with rules. Type: array of strings sourceIpSubnetMasks The valid source ip subnet masks for use with rules.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_DedicatedHost_AllocationStatus
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_DedicatedHost_AllocationStatus Datatype Description This data type represents the structure to hold the allocation properties of a [[SoftLayer_Virtual_DedicatedHost]]. Local cpuAllocated Number of allocated CPU cores on the specified dedicated host. Type: integer cpuAvailable Number of available CPU cores on the specified dedicated host. Type: integer cpuCount Total number of CPU cores on the dedicated host. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Configuration
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Configuration Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Configuration data type contains information relating to a template’s external location for importing and exporting associatedMethods SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Group::createFromExternalSource Local bootMode Optional virtualization boot mode parameter, if set, can mark a template to boot specifically into PV or HVM. Type: string byol Specifies if image is using a customer's software license. Type: boolean cloudInit Specifies if image requires cloud-init.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Configuration
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Configuration Datatype Description The guest configuration container is used to provide configuration options for creating computing instances. Each configuration option will include both an itemPrice and a template. The itemPrice value will provide hourly and monthly costs (if either are applicable), and a description of the option. The template will provide a fragment of the request with the properties and values that must be sent when creating a computing instance with the option.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Configuration_Option
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Configuration_Option Datatype Description An option found within a [[SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Configuration (type)]] structure. Local flavor Provides a description of a pre-defined configuration with monthly and hourly costs. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset itemPrice Provides hourly and monthly costs (if either are applicable), and a description of the option. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price template Provides a fragment of the request with the properties and values that must be sent when creating a computing instance with the option.
